Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
82 Saraṇaduka, Parittārammaṇattika
Saraṇaduka, Parittārammaṇattika
94.
259Saraṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve.
260Saraṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve…pe…  avigate dve.
261Araṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
